name: DEPRESSION BIPOLAR SUPPORT ALLIANCE (DBSA)
description: support to improve the lives of people who have mood disorders
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to advancing mental health policies to help persons with mood disorders.

S.1873, Veteran PEER Act.
